1.0.0.en: Create apps supported by ThirdReality devices.

1.0.2.en: add support for Multi Function Night Light and change some config files.

1.0.4.en: Add support for vibration sensor and button flow.

1.0.5.en: Add support for Garage Door Tilt Sensor and Temperature and Humidity Sensor Lite

1.0.6.en: Added support for startup ON/OFF for Smart Plug (V1, v2, E2) and Multi-Function Night Light.

1.0.7.en: Fix system abnormalities that may be caused by the operation of the device when it is offline.

1.0.8.en: Added support for Smart Watering Kit, Smart Color Bulb ZL1, Smart Soil Moisture Sensor. Support temperature class equipment, add Fahrenheit display.

1.0.10.en: Added manufacturerName of Smart Color Bulb ZL1 and modify the icon of some devices that do not meet the requirements.

1.0.11.en: Modify the manufacturerName of all devices. And Added support for Smart Motion Sensor R1.

1.0.12.en: Modify the manufacturerName of old T&H Sensor Lite and Contact Sensor

1.0.13.en: Optimized the issue that the brightness control of the colored bulb did not have a synchronized state.

1.0.14.en: Added support for Smart Dual Plug ZP1 and Smart Mechanical Keyboard MK1. Add the meter_power and reset summation delivered functions of existing plug devices.

1.0.15.en: Cancel the config report of the dual plug.

1.0.16.en: Added support for water shortage alarm in watering kit.

1.0.17.en: 1. Provide users with the option to set the config report of the soil sensor and temperature and humidity sensor lite in Advanced Settings.

1.0.18.en: Added support for devices such as Smart WaterLeak KM1, Smart Garage Door Opener, and others. Also modified some attributes.
